ygData.subject: Re: Banded Armor vs Chainmail
ygData.msgSnippet: Banded is better than chain. Players sell them at various prices (e.g. theres a price war going on MM at the mo, so can get some cheap banded).  Average prices
ygData.messageBody:
Banded is better than chain.

Players sell them at various prices (e.g. theres a price war going on MM at
the mo, so can get some cheap banded). Average prices are 25pp for tunic,
15pp for legs and every other part is 10pp or under a piece. I spent about
80pp for a full suite of small banded.

> ----------

> Subject: [warriors_eq] Banded Armor vs Chainmail
>
> From: suzkim@...

>
> Been told banded just as good as chainmail but cheaper. True? If so know

> *thinks*

> what would be the first piece I should get?
>
> Azlana, warrior of Veeshan
